kv17.11:5.3: Nanu atthi keci paṭiggāhakā āhuneyyā pāhuneyyā dakkhiṇeyyā añjalikaraṇīyā anuttaraṃ puññakkhettaṃ lokassāti?
kv17.11:5.5: Hañci atthi keci paṭiggāhakā āhuneyyā pāhuneyyā dakkhiṇeyyā añjalikaraṇīyā anuttaraṃ puññakkhettaṃ lokassa, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv17.11:6.3: Nanu cattāro purisayugā aṭṭha purisapuggalā dakkhiṇeyyā vuttā bhagavatāti?
kv17.11:6.5: Hañci cattāro purisayugā aṭṭha purisapuggalā dakkhiṇeyyā vuttā bhagavatā, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv17.11:7.3: Nanu atthi keci sotāpanne dānaṃ datvā dakkhiṇaṃ ārādhentīti?
kv17.11:7.5: Hañci atthi keci sotāpanne dānaṃ datvā dakkhiṇaṃ ārādhenti, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv17.11:8.7: Hañci atthi keci arahato dānaṃ datvā dakkhiṇaṃ ārādhenti, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv17.11:9.3: Añño aññassa kārako, parakataṃ sukhadukkhaṃ, añño karoti añño paṭisaṃvedetīti?
kv17.11:10.6: Atthānanda, dakkhiṇā dāyakato visujjhati, no paṭiggāhakato;
kv17.11:10.7: atthānanda, dakkhiṇā paṭiggāhakato visujjhati, no dāyakato;
kv17.11:10.8: atthānanda, dakkhiṇā dāyakato ceva visujjhati paṭiggāhakato ca;
kv17.11:10.9: atthānanda, dakkhiṇā neva dāyakato visujjhati, no paṭiggāhakato.
kv17.11:10.10: Imā kho, ānanda, catasso dakkhiṇā visuddhiyo”ti.
kv17.11:13.1: Atthi arahato puññūpacayo, natthi arahato akālamaccu, sabbamidaṃ kammato, indriyabaddhaññeva dukkhaṃ, ṭhapetvā ariyamaggaṃ avasesā saṅkhārā dukkhā, saṃgho dakkhiṇaṃ paṭiggaṇhāti, saṃgho dakkhiṇaṃ visodheti, saṃgho bhuñjati pivati khādati sāyati, saṃghassa dinnaṃ mahapphalaṃ, atthi dānaṃ visuddhiyāti.
